title: 1 BR 55+ Independent Senior Living. Luxurious Amenities.
map_address: 10940 Crooked Lake Blvd. NW near 111th Ave. NW
app_fee: $25 application fee per applicant + $300 application deposit
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'At River North, our independent 55+ apartment living community captures the essence of living well.', 'Enjoy the comforts of maintenance-free living along with the convenience of an outstanding location!', 'These new one, two and three bedroom homes offer quality features such as granite kitchen countertops, spacious 9-foot ceilings, and a washer and dryer in every unit.', 'River North also provides a wealth of community amenities for you and your new neighbors – enjoy the beauty salon, 24 hour fitness center, craft room, private library, theatre room, and community room with full kitchen and fireplace!', 'Community Amenities Include:', "- 9' ceilings", '- Transportation: near light rail station for easy outings to Twins game, airport, or Mall of America', '- Utilities included: sewer, water and trash removal services (residents pay gas and electricity)', '- Granite countertops', '- Location: close to many restaurants and lots of great shopping.', '- Beautiful structure and quality building materials', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'River North is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,38.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'River North', '10940 Crooked Lake Blvd NW', 'Coon Rapids, MN, 55433', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'FWR6IvbFaP']
